title: Analytics & Optimization
description: Learn analytics & optimization in this 60-minute video module
learning_objectives: Understand the fundamentals of analytics & optimization
Apply analytics & optimization techniques in practical scenarios
Evaluate the effectiveness of different analytics & optimization approaches
Analyze advanced concepts in analytics & optimization

quiz_questions.question: What is the primary purpose of analytics & optimization?
quiz_questions.explanation: analytics & optimization serves multiple purposes including efficiency, cost reduction, and quality improvement.

quiz_questions.question: Which factor is most important when implementing analytics & optimization?
quiz_questions.explanation: User adoption is crucial for successful implementation of any new system or process.

quiz_questions.question: How would you optimize analytics & optimization for better performance?
quiz_questions.explanation: Optimization requires a holistic approach including automation, training, and monitoring.
